title: Blue Chicken Egg
summaries: The Blue Chicken Egg is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Blue Chicken to follow the player around. The Blue Chicken Egg can be purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 25 GC.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a blue chicken
'A regular blue chicken egg'
statistics.Buy: 25 GC
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
